titles.title: A bill to exclude deposits into a capital construction fund account under section 607(d) of the Merchant Marine Act from net earnings from self-employment.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1470-1471)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936 and the Internal Revenue Code to permit participants in a capital construction fund to reduce their self-employment income by the amount of contributions to such fund. Makes nonqualified withdrawals subject to the self-employment tax.
